sysunews package¶

Submodules¶

sysunews.api module¶

api module, call by db_update module mainly

Function in this module mainly call function in html_extracting module to finish their job.

sysunews.api.get_index_range(data)[source]¶

find the index range

Parameters:data – content of [http://news2.sysu.edu.cn/news0*/index.htm]
Returns:
  • start: an integer, corresponding to the start of index
  • end: an integer, corresponding to the end of index
sysunews.api.get_module(url)[source]¶

Get the module id of a news from its url

Parameters:url – news’ url
Returns:module - the module id
sysunews.api.get_news(news_url)[source]¶

Get a news from its url

Parameters:url – news’ url
Returns:news - a dictionary store many attrubites of the news in key-value
sysunews.api.get_news_fromDB(module, start=1, num=-1)[source]¶

Query data from database

When querying news from DB, the news will be return according to the order of update time, which means the start 1 is the newest news

Parameters:
  • module – an integer to point out from which module to find news
  • start – the start index in DB, 1 means the newest one
  • num – how many news want to get
Returns:

list - a list of news, every news is a dictionary
sysunews.api.get_news_urls(module)[source]¶

Get all urls of certain module

Parameters:module – urls of which module to get
Returns:urls - a list of urls
sysunews.api.get_newsid(url)[source]¶

Get the newsid of a news from its url

Parameters:url – news’ url
Returns:newsid - str of the newsid
sysunews.api.get_newsid_firstpage(module)[source]¶

find the newsid

get the newsid in the first page of three module in order to check whether some new news has been post

Parameters:module – module to get, range form 1 to 3
Returns:newsids - a list of newsid will be returned

sysunews.db_module module¶

Module to process database

sysunews.db_module.check_news(newsid)[source]¶

Check whether the news already exist in table urls

Parameters:tablename – check the news in which table
Returns:return True if find new with the same newsid in table urls else return False
sysunews.db_module.cleandb()[source]¶

Clean the database

This fuction will delete two table: urls and news in sysunewsDB

sysunews.db_module.get_module_newsNum(module)[source]¶

get the num of news is certain module

Parameters:module – find news number of which module
Returns:int - the number of news of certain module in database
sysunews.db_module.get_news(module, start, num)[source]¶

Query data from database

When querying news from DB, the news will be return according to the order of update time, which means the start 1 is the newest news

Parameters:
  • module – find news from which module
  • start – the start index in DB
  • num – how many news want to get
Returns:

result - a list of news, every news is a dictionary
sysunews.db_module.resave_img(url)[source]¶

overwrite the image

When images was broken in local host, the images will be resave in directory /home/images/, and it will not check whether it’s already exists

Parameters:url – the url of the image, like [images/content/2014-11/20141124172306071544.jpg]
sysunews.db_module.save_img(url)[source]¶

Save the image

The images will be save in directory /home/images/, and it will check whether it’s already exists

Parameters:url – the url of the image, like [images/content/2014-11/20141124172306071544.jpg]
sysunews.db_module.save_news(news)[source]¶

Save news into database

Will check whether the news is already in database

Parameters:news – a news dictionary
sysunews.db_module.save_urls(urls)[source]¶

Save the urls into database

When url is already in database, it will just ignore it quietly

Parameters:urls – url list

sysunews.db_update module¶

sysunews.db_update.initial()[source]¶

Initialize the database

:: This function will get all possible news url from the website and save them into database when it’s not exist Should be call by user when it’s first time to setup:

sudo python db_initial.py
sysunews.db_update.update()[source]¶

update the database

This function will be use in server.py to check whether there is new news post into the website every 10 minutes and save new news into database,

sysunews.html_extracting module¶

HTML content processing

This file is the module to processing html content, using regular expression module to match the target content and return them to function in api mainly.

sysunews.html_extracting.find_index_range(data)[source]¶

find the index range

Parameters:data – content of [http://news2.sysu.edu.cn/news0*/index.htm]
Returns:
  • start: an integer, corresponding to the start of index
  • end: an integer, corresponding to the end of index
sysunews.html_extracting.find_module(url)[source]¶

Get the module id of a news from its url

Parameters:url – news’ url
Returns:module - the module id of the news in url
sysunews.html_extracting.find_news(data)[source]¶

Extracting the news attributes from data

Parameters:data – the conten of a news html page
Returns:news - return a structed news
sysunews.html_extracting.find_news_urls(data, module)[source]¶

Find news url in data

Parameters:data – content of a page ex.[http://news2.sysu.edu.cn/news01/index1.htm]
Returns:list - a url list
sysunews.html_extracting.find_newsid(url)[source]¶

Get the newsid of a news from its url

Parameters:url – news’ url
Returns:newsid - the newsid of the news in url

sysunews.initial module¶

initialize the database

:: When it’s the first time to deploy this server program, please enter directory sysunews/, and run this follow two commands:

mysql -u root -p
source db_initial.sql

:: after this two commands, a database sysunewsDB with two table (urls & news) will have been created in your mysql, and then execute:

python initial.py

This will crawl news from news.sysu.edu.cn and save them into the database created before

sysunews.post_module module¶

Main Request object

This file contains some definition of Request object to be used in api to get the content of certain website page

sysunews.post_module.req_easy_req(address)[source]¶

get a simple request object

Parameters:address – the url to open
Returns:Request - a Request object
sysunews.post_module.req_get_news(news_url)[source]¶

get a Request object

Parameters:news_url – an url of a news like: [http://news2.sysu.edu.cn/news01/141185.htm]
Returns:Request - a Request object to open a news url
sysunews.post_module.req_get_news_urls(module, index='')[source]¶

get a request object

Parameters:
  • module – 1 - 中大新闻 2 - 每周聚焦 3 - 媒体中大
  • index – certain page of a module
Returns:

Request - a Request object

sysunews.server module¶

server module

This module help to run a server program to solve HTTP get request from client base on webpy framwork

class sysunews.server.Getnews[source]¶

Class to solve url /news

Can solve url with three parameters
/news?module=1&start=1&num=1
GET()[source]¶

Get news as json object

Returns:newslist - a list of news in json type
class sysunews.server.GetnewsNum[source]¶

Class to solve url /able

Request url must contains a parameter
/able?module=1
GET()[source]¶

get the num of news is certain module

Returns:(json) key - count & value - the number of news of certain module in database:
class sysunews.server.Getnews_html[source]¶

Class to solve url /news

Can solve url with three parameters::
/news?module=1&start=1&num=1
GET()[source]¶

get html content of news

Returns:htmltext - html contents of news that being request, can display in a pretty way in browser
class sysunews.server.Images[source]¶

Handler that solve url /home/images/*

GET(url)[source]¶

Get a images with a url

the url is the path to a images that has been saved in local directory /home/images/

Parameters:url – image url like [/home/images/content/...]
sysunews.server.update_news_intime(minutes)[source]¶

update the news database

Parameters:minutes – update the database every 10 minutes when minutes = 10
